panels.title: RED Metrics

targets.expr: sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Requests

targets.expr: sum by (svc_name, content_key) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{is_error="false", svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (svc_name, content_key) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Success Rate

targets.expr: sum by (svc_name, content_key) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_sum{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (svc_name, content_key) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/1000000

panels.title: Avg. Duration

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

panels.title: Duration Percentile
Request Polaris Metrics
Polaris Metrics Comparison

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_net_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange)) + histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_epoll_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

panels.title: Is network ok? Check the dependency latency.
Is the CPU limit sufficient?
Whether futex latency affects QPS?

targets.expr: sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_cpu_duration_nanoseconds_sum{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_cpu_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Average onCPU time per request
P90 onCPU time per request

targets.expr: sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_net_duration_nanoseconds_sum{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_net_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))

targets.expr: sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_epoll_duration_nanoseconds_sum{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_epoll_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))

targets.expr: sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_futex_duration_nanoseconds_sum{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_futex_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key",container_id=~"$container_id", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Average time wait for other resources per request

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
